verses.text_uthmani: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا

translations.text: Is there not a period of time when each human is nothing yet worth mentioning?<sup foot_note=77573>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hal ata AAala al-insani heenunmina addahri lam yakun shay-an mathkoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا

translations.text: ˹For˺ indeed, We ˹alone˺ created humans from a drop of mixed fluids,<sup foot_note=77574>1</sup> ˹in order˺ to test them, so We made them hear and see.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna khalaqna al-insanamin nutfatin amshajin nabtaleehi fajaAAalnahusameeAAan baseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

translations.text: We already showed them the Way, whether they ˹choose to˺ be grateful or ungrateful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hadaynahu assabeelaimma shakiran wa-imma kafoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا

translations.text: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains, shackles, and a blazing Fire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna aAAtadna lilkafireenasalasila waaghlalan wasaAAeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

translations.text: Indeed, the virtuous will have a drink ˹of pure wine˺—flavoured with camphor—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna al-abrara yashraboona min ka/sinkana mizajuha kafoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا

translations.text: ˹from˺ a spring where Allah’s servants will drink, flowing at their will.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAaynan yashrabu biha AAibaduAllahi yufajjiroonaha tafjeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا

translations.text: They ˹are those who˺ fulfil ˹their˺ vows and fear a Day of sweeping horror,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yoofoona binnathri wayakhafoonayawman kana sharruhu mustateera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا

translations.text: and give food—despite their desire for it—to the poor, the orphan, and the captive,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WayutAAimona attaAAamaAAala hubbihi miskeenan wayateeman waaseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا

translations.text: ˹saying to themselves,˺ “We feed you only for the sake of Allah, seeking neither reward nor thanks from you.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innama nutAAimukum liwajhi Allahila nureedu minkum jazaan wala shukoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا

translations.text: We fear from our Lord a horribly distressful Day.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna nakhafu min rabbinayawman AAaboosan qamtareera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا

translation.text: and will cause them to meet

translations.text: So Allah will deliver them from the horror of that Day, and grant them radiance and joy,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fawaqahumu Allahu sharra thalikaalyawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasuroora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا

translations.text: and reward them for their perseverance with a Garden ˹in Paradise˺ and ˹garments of˺ silk.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajazahum bima sabaroojannatan wahareera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا

translations.text: There they will be reclining on ˹canopied˺ couches, never seeing scorching heat or bitter cold.<sup foot_note=77575>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Muttaki-eena feeha AAala al-ara-ikila yarawna feeha shamsan wala zamhareera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا

translations.text: The Garden’s shade will be right above them, and its fruit will be made very easy to reach.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wadaniyatan AAalayhim thilaluhawathullilat qutoofuha tathleela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠

translations.text: They will be waited on with silver vessels and cups of crystal—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayutafu AAalayhim bi-aniyatinmin fiddatin waakwabin kanat qawareera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا

translations.text: crystalline silver, filled precisely as desired.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qawareera min fiddatinqaddarooha taqdeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

translation.text: And they will be given to drink

translations.text: And they will be given a drink ˹of pure wine˺ flavoured with ginger
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayusqawna feeha ka/san kanamizajuha zanjabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا

translations.text: from a spring there, called Salsabîl.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAaynan feeha tusammasalsabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا

translations.text: They will be waited on by eternal youths. If you saw them, you would think they were scattered pearls.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayatoofu AAalayhim wildanunmukhalladoona itha raaytahum hasibtahum lu/lu-anmanthoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا

translations.text: And if you looked around, you would see ˹indescribable˺ bliss and a vast kingdom.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha raayta thamma raaytanaAAeeman wamulkan kabeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا

translation.text: and will give them to drink

translations.text: The virtuous will be ˹dressed˺ in garments of fine green silk and rich brocade, and adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.<sup foot_note=77576>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAaliyahum thiyabu sundusinkhudrun wa-istabraqun wahulloo asawira minfiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا

translations.text: ˹And they will be told,˺ “All this is surely a reward for you. Your striving has been appreciated.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hatha kana lakum jazaanwakana saAAyukum mashkoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا

translations.text: Indeed, it is We Who have revealed the Quran to you ˹O Prophet˺ in stages.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna nahnu nazzalnaAAalayka alqur-ana tanzeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا

translations.text: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not yield to any evildoer or ˹staunch˺ disbeliever from among them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasbir lihukmi rabbikawala tutiAA minhum athiman aw kafoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا

translations.text: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord morning and evening,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkuri isma rabbikabukratan waaseela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا

translations.text: and prostrate before Him during part of the night,<sup foot_note=77577>1</sup> and glorify Him long at night.<sup foot_note=77578>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamina allayli fasjud lahu wasabbihhulaylan taweela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا

translations.text: Surely those ˹pagans˺ love this fleeting world, ˹totally˺ neglecting a weighty Day ahead of them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna haola-i yuhibboonaalAAajilata wayatharoona waraahum yawmanthaqeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا

translations.text: It is We Who created them and perfected their ˹physical˺ form. But if We will, We can easily replace them with others.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Nahnu khalaqnahum washadadnaasrahum wa-itha shi/na baddalna amthalahumtabdeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

translations.text: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hathihi tathkiratun famanshaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا

translations.text: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺ unless Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama tashaoona illa anyashaa Allahu inna Allaha kanaAAaleeman hakeema
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا

translations.text: He admits whoever He wills into His mercy. As for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yudkhilu man yashao fee rahmatihiwaththalimeena aAAadda lahum AAathabanaleema
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
